body_html:
so far root cause is pointing to the compiler flags not being consistently passed; specifically the -march is getting stripped from the build of allocator.cc which then leads the eigen includes to not set EIGEN_VECTORIZE_AVX512 which then causes.. well disaster.
This is not limited to allocator.cc but it seems to be a broader generic problem of cflags

This is not limited to allocator.cc but it seems to be a broader generic problem of cflags
